headline: Is PPG Industries (PPG) Still Attractive After Strong Year To Date Share Gains?
summary: If you are wondering whether PPG Industries is offering fair value at its current share price, this article walks through what the numbers are really saying about the stock. The shares last closed at US$131.34, with recent returns of 3.8% over 7 days, 19.2% over 30 days, 25.9% year to date and 14.5% over 1 year, which may have changed how investors view its potential and risk.
